Trait rerun::external::re_log_types::external::arrow2_convert::serialize::TryIntoArrow

pub trait TryIntoArrow<'a, ArrowArray, Element>: IntoIterator<Item = &'a Element>where
    Element: 'static,{
    fn try_into_arrow(self) -> Result<ArrowArray, Error>;
    fn try_into_arrow_as_type<ArrowType>(self) -> Result<ArrowArray, Error>
    where
        ArrowType: 'static + ArrowSerialize<Type = Element> + ArrowField;
}
Expand description

Top-level API to serialize to Arrow

Required Methods§

fn try_into_arrow(self) -> Result<ArrowArray, Error>

Convert from any iterable collection into an arrow2::Array

fn try_into_arrow_as_type<ArrowType>(self) -> Result<ArrowArray, Error>where
    ArrowType: 'static + ArrowSerialize<Type = Element> + ArrowField,

Convert from any iterable collection into an arrow2::Array by coercing the conversion to a specific Arrow type. This is useful when the same rust type maps to one or more Arrow types for example LargeString.
